nodes.text: Star Wars: Bounty Hunters for Hire
Star Wars: Bounty Hunters for Hire is a Level 2 DK Reader, written by Catherine Saunders and released on March 18, 2013.

Become a "Star Wars" expert with "Star Wars Bounty Hunters for Hire". The force is strong in "Star Wars Bounty Hunters for Hire". Discover the secrets of these mysterious and brutal mercenaries, including the most famous and powerful of them all - Boba and Jango Fett. Join them as they travel through the universe and embark on adventures. Level 2 Readers are designed for taking the next step in gaining reading confidence. Easy to read stories include longer sentences and increased vocabulary. The simple index shows your child more about the world of "Star Wars" and information boxes support the story as they explore the exciting universe of bounty hunters like Boba Fett. Continue the reading adventure with "Star Wars Bounty Hunters for Hire".
